issue.title: [C++] FileSystem enum causes attributes warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/512427577?check_suite_focus=true#step:7:996

```Java

In file included from /arrow/r/check/arrow.Rcheck/00_pkg_src/arrow/libarrow/arrow-0.16.0.9000/include/arrow/dataset/discovery.h:31:0,
                 from /arrow/r/check/arrow.Rcheck/00_pkg_src/arrow/libarrow/arrow-0.16.0.9000/include/arrow/dataset/api.h:21,
                 from ./arrow_types.h:203,
                 from array_to_vector.cpp:18:
/arrow/r/check/arrow.Rcheck/00_pkg_src/arrow/libarrow/arrow-0.16.0.9000/include/arrow/filesystem/filesystem.h:65:1: warning: type attributes ignored after type is already defined [-Wattributes]
```

This isn't new but I've been staring at the R Linux builds a lot and wanted to clean this up.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8139?focusedCommentId=17061286) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6646
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6646>
